Articles.Content:
I've been playing around with Kerbal Foundries' anti-grav repulsors again, alongside the Mk2 Expansion pack and its nuclear jet engines. The result is a craft that I call.... Floaty. (Don't ask.)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tVStjzzTwT4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

And between testing Floaty and the usual hijinks, I had enough outtakes to put together a little video celebration of the most popular holiday among Kerbals--Explosion Day!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IMTLs7XVPpM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
